kv5.6:1.4: Nanu pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa atthi ñāṇaṁ, pathavīkasiṇañca sammutisaccamhīti?
kv5.6:1.6: Hañci pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa atthi ñāṇaṁ, pathavīkasiṇañca sammutisaccamhi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv5.6:2.6: gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ dadantassa atthi ñāṇaṁ, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro ca sammutisaccamhīti?
kv5.6:2.8: Hañci gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ dadantassa atthi ñāṇaṁ, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro ca sammutisaccamhi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv5.6:3.3: Tena ñāṇena dukkhaṁ parijānāti, samudayaṁ pajahati, nirodhaṁ sacchikaroti, maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
